dataList.content: I won't let you get away this time.
Give my Catherine back, you git.

dataList.title: A Distant World
dataList.content: ... Even if you were to pursue me, even if you were to grab me...

dataList.title: A Distant World
dataList.content: It will change nothing. Catherine has already left you.

dataList.title: A Distant World
dataList.content: That is the most undeniable truth, isn't it? Shovel up the soil and exhume her body for all you want. But this is an immutable truth.

dataList.title: A Distant World
dataList.content: There she lies, wearing an ineffable, ethereal smile. She always is.
I know. But I am trying my damnest to change it. So shut up and—

dataList.title: A Distant World
dataList.content: Allow me to relieve you of the struggle. You will suffer, longing for her for as much as eternity permits... Searching for Catherine, who is long gone from this world...

dataList.title: A Distant World
dataList.content: Every strand of despair leads to the same answer. At the end of every path, you will mutter to yourself.

dataList.title: A Distant World
dataList.content: That once your repentance is complete, you shall lie beside her in that coffin with your cold, still heart.

dataList.title: A Distant World
dataList.content: I merely mean to lift the years of that suffering from your shoulders. Join the other Heathcliffs in their trail of penitence, and I shall grant you the early peace of your heart that you so deserve!
Sod off! I don't need your shite idea of 'peace'...
That's... not how I want to find my peace.

dataList.title: A Distant World
dataList.content: I wonder if you would say the same thing, even with the revelation that all of this... is exactly what Catherine wanted?
